#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<math.h>
using namespace std;
#define MAX 2000001
unsigned long long int a[MAX];
#define gc() getchar_unlocked()
int fastio()
{
int x=0;
char c=gc();
while(c<'0'||c>'9')
c=gc();
while(c>='0'&&c<='9')
{
x=(x<<1)+(x<<3)+c-'0';
c=gc();
}
return x;
}
unsigned long long int fastLongio()
{
unsigned long long int x=0;
char c=gc();
while(c<'0'||c>'9')
c=gc();
while(c>='0'&&c<='9')
{
x=(x<<1)+(x<<3)+c-'0';
c=gc();
}
return x;
}
void init(unsigned long long int mod)
{
    int i;
    a[1]=1;
    a[2]=1;
    for(i=3;i<MAX;i++){
        a[i]=(a[i-1]+a[i-2])%mod;
    }
}
int main()
{
int t;
unsigned long long int n,m,up,down;
t=fastio();
while(t--)
{
    //scanf("%llu %llu",&n,&m);
    n=fastLongio();
    m=fastLongio();
    init(m);
    up=a[2*n-1]%m;
    down=a[2*n]%m;
    printf("%llu/%llu\n",up,down);
}
return 0;
 
}
